languages.text: На данном ранге архетипа персонаж получает спецспособность, которую может использовать как {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}. Доступность особых способностей зависит от значения моментума отряда. Если моментум достигает 175, персонажу становится доступен героический акт. Если опускается ниже 25 — приходит время отчаянных мер.
languages.original_text:
At this rank, the character gains a special ability that can be used as {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, it's time for desperate measures.

languages.text:
At this archetype rank, characters gain a special archetype ability that can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.

traits.locale_text:
At this archetype rank, characters gain a special archetype ability that can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.

These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.

At this archetype rank, characters gain a special archetype ability that can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.

languages.text:
到达此职业等级时，角色可以获得特殊的职业能力，可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。
特殊能力对队伍的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}值有要求。当士气超过175时，便可以使用英雄壮举，而当士气低于25时，或许是时候进行背水一战了。
languages.original_text:
At this archetype rank, characters gain a special archetype ability that can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.

traits.locale_text:
到达此职业等级时，角色可以获得特殊的职业能力，可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。
特殊能力对队伍的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}值有要求。当士气超过175时，便可以使用英雄壮举，而当士气低于25时，或许是时候进行背水一战了。

languages.text: Bei diesem Archetyp-Rang erhalten die Charaktere eine spezielle Archetyp-Fähigkeit, die als {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} eingesetzt werden kann. Diese Fähigkeiten werden abhängig vom {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}-Wert der Gruppe verfügbar. Erreicht die Dynamik 175, steht dem Charakter die Heldentat zur Verfügung. Fällt sie unter 25, ist es vielleicht an der Zeit, eine Verzweiflungstat einzusetzen.
languages.original_text:
At this archetype rank, characters gain a special archetype ability that can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.

traits.locale_text:
Bei diesem Doktrin-Rang erhalten die Charaktere eine spezielle Doktrin-Fähigkeit, die als {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} eingesetzt werden kann.
Diese Fähigkeiten werden abhängig vom {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}-Wert der Gruppe verfügbar. Erreicht die Dynamik 175, steht dem Charakter die Heldentat zur Verfügung. Fällt sie unter 25, ist es vielleicht an der Zeit, eine Verzweiflungstat einzusetzen.

languages.text:
En atteignant ce rang d'archétype, le personnage accède à une capacité d'archétype spéciale qui peut être utilisée comme un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g}.
La disponibilité de ces capacités dépend de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} du groupe. Si la fougue atteint 175, le personnage pourra effectuer un acte héroïque. Si elle tombe à 25, il pourra recourir à une mesure désespérée.
languages.original_text:
At this archetype rank, characters gain a special archetype ability that can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.

traits.locale_text:
En atteignant ce rang de doctrine, le personnage accède à une capacité de doctrine spéciale qui peut être utilisée comme un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g}.
La disponibilité de ces capacités dépend de la valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} du groupe. Si la fougue atteint 175, le personnage pourra effectuer un acte héroïque. Si elle tombe à 25, il pourra effectuer une mesure désespérée.

languages.text:
En este rango de arquetipo, los personajes obtienen una capacidad especial de arquetipo que se puede usar como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o como {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}.
Estas capacidades pasan a estar disponibles dependiendo del {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} del grupo. Si supera los 175 puntos, el acto heroico pasa a estar disponible, mientras que si baja de 25 es la medida desesperada la que podrá ser utilizada.
languages.original_text:
At this archetype rank, characters gain a special archetype ability that can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.

traits.locale_text:
En este rango de arquetipo, los personajes obtienen una capacidad especial de arquetipo que se puede usar como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o como {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}.
Estas capacidades pasan a estar disponibles dependiendo del {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} del grupo. Si supera los 175 puntos, el acto heroico pasa a estar disponible, mientras que si baja de 25 es la medida desesperada la que podrá ser utilizada.

languages.text:
このタイプランクでは、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}として使える特別なタイプ能力を得る。
これらの能力は、部隊の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}に応じて使用可能になる。
勢いが175に達すれば、英雄的行為が使用可能になる。勢いが25を下回った時には、非常手段を採用するべきかもしれない。
languages.original_text:
At this archetype rank, characters gain a special archetype ability that can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.

traits.locale_text:
このタイプランクでは、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}として使える特別なタイプ能力を得る。
これらの能力は、部隊の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}に応じて使用可能になる。
勢いが175に達すれば、英雄的行為が使用可能になる。勢いが25を下回った時には、非常手段を採用するべきかもしれない。

languages.text:
Karakterler, bu arketip kademesinde {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} olarak kullanılabilecek özel bir arketip kabiliyeti kazanırlar.
Bu kabiliyetler, grubun {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} değerine bağlı olarak kullanılabilir hâle gelir. Momentum 175'e ulaşırsa karakter kahramanca eylemi kullanabilir hâle gelir. 25'in altına düşerse de son çare önleme başvurma zamanı gelmiş olabilir.
languages.original_text:
At this archetype rank, characters gain a special archetype ability that can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.
These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If momentum reaches 175, the heroic act becomes available to the character. If it drops below 25, then it may be time to employ a desperate measure.
